Question: Dongguan Fulida Rubber co.,ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Fulida Rubber Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Manufacturer of computer mouse pads, professional game mouse pads, game gloves, rubber roll materials, bar mats, yoga mats, and anti-slip mats.
- Offers customization in material, specification, design, logo printing, and packing.
- Products are natural, odorless, environmentally friendly, non-toxic, and harmless to the human body.
- Compliant with CE, SGS, and ROHS tests for raw materials.
- Strict quality control and supervision of production.
- Offers natural foam rubber roll material, high-class mouse pads, computer game gloves, bar mats, yoga mats, coasters, and desk pads.
- Custom-made designs, logos, and OEM orders are welcomed.
- Emphasizes on high quality, reasonable pricing, and sincere service.
- Products serve as promotional tools and gifts.
- Available in various materials such as natural rubber, neoprene rubber, nitrile rubber, SBR, EVA, PP, PVC foam, 3D lenticular, gel, silicon, aluminum, polyester fabric, non-woven fabric, lycra, and polished fabric.
